    DC, Maryland, Virginia’s Favorite Restaurants

    My friend Cecilia has compiled a list of DMV’s favorite restaurants and I’d like to share this with the rest of the world. I personally haven’t been to all these places but it’s in my to-try list 😀
    Japanese
    • Kaz Sushi Bistro www.kazsushi.com – Foggy Bottom/Farragut West, DC
    • Sushi Taro www.sushitaro.com – Dupont Circle, DC
    • Kotobuki – www.kotobukiusa.com – Palisades area, DC

    Italian

    • Teatro Goldini  www.teatrogoldoni.com – Foggy Bottom DC
    • Sette Osteria  www.setteosteria.com – I like the one in Clarendon
    • Ella’s Pizza www.ellaspizza.com – Chinatown, DC

    Belgium

    • Belga Café www.belgacafe.com – Eastern Market, DC
    • Brasserie Beck http://www.beckdc.com – Metro Center/McPherson Square, DC

    Tea & Coffee

    • Tryst www.trystdc.com -Adams Morgan, DC
    • Café Bonaparte www.cafebonaparte.com – Georgetown, DC
    • Teaism www.teaism.com – Various location, DC
    • Illy’s Café www.yelp.com/biz/illy-cafe-washington – Farragut West, DC
    • Leopold’s Kafe www.kafeleopolds.com – Georgetown, DC
    • Le Pain Quotidien www.lepainquotidien.com – various locations, but I usually go to Bethesda, MD , Dupont, or Georgetown locations
    • Filter’s Coffee House www.filtercoffeehouse.com – Dupont Circle

    American

    • Georgia’s Brown www.gbrowns.com – McPherson Square
    • The Tasting Room  www.thetastingroomwinebar.com – Chevy Chase
    • Central Michel Richard  www.centralmichelrichard.com – Federal Triangle
    • Liberty Tavern www.thelibertytavern.com – Clarandon
    • Blue Duck Tavern  www.blueducktavern.com – Foggy Bottom
    • Match Box Chinatown www.matchboxchinatown.com – Chinatown and Eastern Market, but I usually go to Chinatown
    • Old Ebbit Grill  www.ebbitt.com – Metro Center/McPherson

    Spanish/Latino

    • Jaleo www.jaleo.com – various locations, but I usually go to Penn Quarter/Chinatown
    • Café Atlantico www.cafeatlantico.com – Penn Quater
    • Ceiba  www.ceibarestaurant.com – McPherson Square/Metro Center

    French

    • Café Du Parc  www.cafeduparc.com – McPherson Square/Metro Center
    • Bistro Du Coin  www.bistrotducoin.com – Dupont Circle

    Mediterranean

    • Zaytinya  www.zaytinya.com – Chinatown

    Ethiopian

    • Meskerem www.meskeremonline.com – U street

    Burmese

    • Burma Restaurant  www.yelp.com/biz/burma-restaurant-washington – Chinatown
    • Mandalay Restaurant www.mandalayrestaurantcafe.net – Silver Spring, MD

    Vietnamese

    • Eden Center www.edencenter.com -Falls Church, VA

    Thai

    • Thai Square www.thaisquarerestaurant.com -Arlington, VA

    Malaysian

    • Malaysian Kopitiam  www.malaysiakopitiam.com – Farragut West/Foggy Bottom

    Pan Asian

    • TenPhen www.tenpenh.com – Federal Triangle

    Burger

    • Ray’s Hell Burger www.yelp.com/biz/rays-hell-burger-arlington-2 -Rosslyn, VA
    • Good Stuff Eatery www.goodstuffeatery.com – Capitol Hill

    Happy Hour (have good deals! And… apparently around my work! haha)

    • Ping Pong Dim Sum www.pingpongdimsum.us – Chinatown
    • Zaytinya – Chinatown (repeated)
    • Gordon Biersch www.gordonbiersch.com – I go to Chinatown location
    • Fado www.fadoirishpub.com -Chinatown
    • Zengo www.richardsandoval.com/zengodc/ – Chinatown
    • Bus Boys & Poets – www.busboysandpoets.com – U street location is MUCH better than Sherlington!!
    • White Castle  www.whitecastle.com – Metro Center/Federal Triangle
    • Vapiano www.vapianointernational.com – I go to Chinatown or Farragut North/West location
    • Nando’s Peri Peri  www.nandosperiperi.com – I go to Chinatown location
    • Zorba’s Café www.zorbascafe.com – Dupont Circle

    Places that Cecilia wants to try these days – some of these are quite expensive, so I don’t know when it’s happening, but….^^;

    • Ted’s Bulletin – www.tedsbulletin.com – Eastern Market
    • Marcel’s www.marcelsdc.com – Foggy Bottom
    • Michel Richard Citronelle  www.citronelledc.com – Georgetown
    • Proof www.proofdc.com – Penn Quater
    • Vidalia  www.vidaliadc.com – Foggy Bottom/Farragut North
    • Kushi Izakaya & Sushi  eatkushi.tumblr.com – Mt. Vernon Square
    • Temari  www.yelp.com/biz/temari-japanese-cafe-rockville – Rockville,  MD
    • Sonoma www.sonomadc.com – Capitol Hill
    • Churchkey   www.churchkeydc.com – Logan Circle
    • RIS www.risdc.com – Foggy Bottom
    • Palena www.palenarestaurant.com – Cleveland Park
    • Black’s Bar and Kitchen www.blacksbarandkitchen.com – Bethesda, MD

    permalink: /2011/01/05/dc-maryland-virginias-favorite-restaurants/
